extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    GEOL249 and MATH232, or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Geophysical methods (gravity, magnetic, electrical, and seismic) applied to engineering problems, including resource exploration and site investigation. Design of field programs considering physical principles, instrumentation, limitations, field procedures and data interpretation. Laboratory projects with geophysical equipment are undertaken.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Applied Geophysics
